channel.title: map_edit and ragdolls
channel.description:
I've done a few personal tests on using wc_(/hammer)_update_entity with ragdolls, and they have gone well, but it only really works for making the ragdolls settled- I can't position them at all without shooting them up, which I can't do in map_edit because of the node gun.
Is there a command to get rid of the node gun?

item.title: map_edit and ragdolls
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Ah, right. Didn’t think to look at the page again. Silly me.
Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: map_edit and ragdolls
item.dc:creator: _Gotta
item.description:
https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Map_edit

Specifically:

If you are going to move props around with the gravity gun in map_edit mode, you must first disable or modify the default key bindings in map_edit.cfg (discussed above). Otherwise, the gravity gun will be completely useless and clicking the left or right mouse button will place or destroy nodes instead of activating the gun’s expected functions.

Read full topic

item.title: map_edit and ragdolls
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
What’s the node gun?

You might try giving yourself a gun with “give” rather than impulse 101ing. Though you may have already tried that. In fact, you almost certainly have, so just ignore this reply. Unless you want to answer my question, in which feel free.

Read full topic
